title: Agricultural Surveillance Drone Solutions
description: Robofly provides agricultural drone surveillance services for crop health monitoring, NDVI, CVI, growth and mortality analysis—delivering real-time, accurate insights that boost yield and optimize farm management across large-scale plantations.

title: Drone Mapping Services (DSM, DTM, Ortho)
description: We offer aerial drone mapping solutions including Digital Surface Models (DSM), Digital Terrain Models (DTM), and orthomosaic maps—enabling precise land surveys, construction planning, and topographic analysis with centimeter-level accuracy.

title: Dam Surveillance and Structural Analysis
description: Our drone-based dam inspection services help detect structural cracks, seepage, and erosion risks through high-resolution imagery and thermal scans—ensuring timely maintenance and disaster prevention.

title: Industrial & Infrastructure Inspection Services
description: Robofly delivers custom drone inspection services for power lines, towers, pipelines, solar farms, and infrastructure—offering a safer, faster, and cost-effective alternative to manual inspections.

title: Forest Fire Prediction & Eradication System
description: Our AI-powered forest fire drone solution integrates machine learning with aerial surveillance to predict fire spread risk, detect early-stage fires, and support rapid response in wildfire-prone zones.

title: Post-Wildfire Biodiversity & Impact Assessment
description: We conduct post-fire drone assessments to analyze biodiversity loss and measure the environmental impact zone—helping environmental agencies and forest departments plan restoration and conservation efforts.
